title: Manage Inspection Contingency
description: After a home inspection reveals issues, the buyer's agent must negotiate repairs or credits with the seller's agent.

tasks.description: Receive the inspection report and review it with the buyer to identify key issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the most critical repair items for negotiation.

tasks.description: Draft a repair request addendum listing the requested repairs or a credit in lieu of repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal addendum to the purchase agreement.

tasks.description: Negotiate the terms of the repair addendum with the listing agent until an agreement is reached.
tasks.expected_outcome: Both parties sign the addendum, resolving the inspection contingency.
